Package org.neo4j.kernel.api.impl.index

Interface DatabaseIndex<READER extends IndexReader>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SchemaIndex
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDatabaseIndex, DroppableIndex, ReadOnlyAbstractDatabaseIndex, ReadOnlyDatabaseSchemaIndex, ReadOnlyFulltextIndex, WritableAbstractDatabaseIndex, WritableDatabaseSchemaIndex, WritableFulltextIndex
    public interface DatabaseIndex<READER extends IndexReader>
extends Closeable
    Lucene index that may consist of one or multiple separate lucene indexes that are represented as independent partitions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      LuceneAllDocumentsReader allDocumentsReader()
      Creates an iterable over all documents in all partitions.
      void create()
      Creates new index.
      void drop()
      Close index and deletes all it's partitions.
      boolean exists()
      Check lucene index existence within all allocated partitions.
      void flush()
      Commits all index partitions.
      IndexDescriptor getDescriptor()  
      READER getIndexReader()  
      LuceneIndexWriter getIndexWriter()  
      List<AbstractIndexPartition> getPartitions()
      Get index partitions
      boolean isOnline()
      Check if this index is marked as online.
      boolean isOpen()
      Check if index is open or not
      boolean isReadOnly()
      Check if index is opened in read only mode
      boolean isValid()
      Verify state of the index.
      void markAsFailed​(String failure)
      Writes the given failure message to the failure storage.
      void markAsOnline()
      Marks index as online by including "status" -> "online" map into commit metadata of the first partition.
      void maybeRefreshBlocking()
      Refresh all partitions to make newly inserted data visible for readers.
      void open()
      Open index with all allocated partitions.
      ResourceIterator<Path> snapshot()
      Snapshot of all file in all index partitions.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • create

        void create()
     throws IOException
        Creates new index. As part of creation process index will allocate all required folders, index failure storage and will create its first partition.

        Index creation do not automatically open it. To be able to use index please open it first.

        Throws:
        IOException

      • open

        void open()
   throws IOException
        Open index with all allocated partitions.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • isOpen

        boolean isOpen()
        Check if index is open or not
        Returns:
        true if index is open

      • isReadOnly

        boolean isReadOnly()
        Check if index is opened in read only mode
        Returns:
        true if index open in rad only mode

      • exists

        boolean exists()
        throws IOException
        Check lucene index existence within all allocated partitions.
        Returns:
        true if index exist in all partitions, false when index is empty or does not exist
        Throws:
        IOException

      • isValid

        boolean isValid()
        Verify state of the index. If index is already open and in use method assume that index is valid since lucene already operating with it, otherwise necessary checks perform.
        Returns:
        true if lucene confirm that index is in valid clean state or index is already open.

      • drop

        void drop()
        Close index and deletes all it's partitions.

      • flush

        void flush()
    throws IOException
        Commits all index partitions.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • allDocumentsReader

        LuceneAllDocumentsReader allDocumentsReader()
        Creates an iterable over all documents in all partitions.
        Returns:
        LuceneAllDocumentsReader over all documents

      • snapshot

        ResourceIterator<Path> snapshot()
                         throws IOException
        Snapshot of all file in all index partitions.
        Returns:
        iterator over all index files.
        Throws:
        IOException
        See Also:
        WritableIndexSnapshotFileIterator

      • maybeRefreshBlocking

        void maybeRefreshBlocking()
                   throws IOException
        Refresh all partitions to make newly inserted data visible for readers.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getPartitions

        Get index partitions
        Returns:
        list of index partition

        IndexDescriptor getDescriptor()

      • isOnline

        boolean isOnline()
          throws IOException
        Check if this index is marked as online.
        Returns:
        true if index is online, false otherwise
        Throws:
        IOException

      • markAsOnline

        void markAsOnline()
           throws IOException
        Marks index as online by including "status" -> "online" map into commit metadata of the first partition.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • markAsFailed

        void markAsFailed​(String failure)
           throws IOException
        Writes the given failure message to the failure storage.
        Parameters:
        failure - the failure message.
        Throws:
        IOException
